translation.en: Prayers will have to be one of them. Okay.
Now that you have been invigorated,
you have now been showered,
some blessings from God and that will make you agile.

translation.en: I want you to go back to your posts now
translation.zh: 我要你们现在回到各自岗位

translation.en: as people who have received blessing. Amen!
translation.zh: 你们已经是受到祝福的人了 阿门！

translation.en: [crowd cheers] Amen.
Back, back, back...
[woman] Praise the lord.
[Godswill] Ada-nna.
Ada-nna.
[Adaeze] Morning.
You know I wonder why and I was, I was...
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么 我就想

translation.en: trying to admonish them to be doing this.
[in Igbo] It's not all about money. God is the provider of money.
translation.zh: 生活不全是为了赚钱 上帝是金钱的提供者

translation.en: [in English] Do you know what I'm saying?
[Godswill] No, I can see that.
Made lots of improvement.
Just to warm the place up.
translation.zh: 我只是为这地方做准备

translation.en: So, what's on your schedule, like, today?
What is the order of business for today?
translation.zh: 今天的工作顺序是什么？

translation.en: Well, first things first, we have to get you settled in.

translation.en: I haven't forgot I'm supposed to have an office.
translation.zh: 我记得我应该有个办公室

translation.en: You know, naturally you will be in daddy's office which is right there.
translation.zh: 你自然应该坐在爸爸的办公室 就在那里

translation.en: Odogwu's office, don't go there.
Ogodwu is the oracle of this company,
translation.zh: 你爸是这个公司的先知

translation.en: I am not qualified to take his seat, no.
translation.zh: 我还不够格坐他的位置

translation.en: Look, I don't need anything elaborate.
This place is, this is perfect for me now.
This is good, yes it is.
This is good.
Uncle, are you sure?
Look, Ada-nna, if you want to spray insecticides
translation.zh: 艾达 如果你要用杀虫剂喷

translation.en: on cockroaches, snakes and scorpions,
you take yourself, get yourself a vantage position.
translation.zh: 给你自己找个有利位置

translation.en: Here is a vantage position, so I can have my lens over, all over.
translation.zh: 这里就是有利位置 我可以看清楚他们所有人

translation.en: Don't worry.
Okay. If you insist.
translation.zh: 好 如果你坚持的话

translation.en: I insist, my dear.
No problems. I'll work here.
translation.zh: 没问题 我会在这工作

translation.en: Ma?
The external auditors are coming upstairs now. Right now.
translation.zh: 外聘审计员现在上楼了

translation.en: Okay. I will be in my office.
translation.zh: 好 我会在我办公室

translation.en: Uncle, I have a meeting with the external auditors.
translation.zh: 叔叔 我和外聘审计员要开会

translation.en: I don't know if you would like to join me.
-Is it necessary? Well, if it is-- -Yes, so please. Please.
translation.zh: -有必要吗？如果有… -有必要 来吧

translation.en: Alright.
Chameleon. Very good.
Thank you for coming.
So, given our current situation
can you tell us how bad the numbers are?
translation.zh: 可以告诉我们数据显示有多糟吗？

translation.en: Bad.
Try abysmal, madam.
translation.zh: 可以用无底深渊来形容 夫人

translation.en: But I could have told you that yesterday
translation.zh: 不过我昨天就可以告诉你

translation.en: if you hadn't cancelled our appointment scheduled at--
12:00 p.m., West African time.
translation.zh: 西非时间中午十二点的约会

translation.en: I apologize.
I had an emergency so I had to--
translation.zh: 我有个急事所以我不得不…

translation.en: [female auditor] We all have emergencies, Miss Obiagu.
translation.zh: 我们都有急事 奥比亚古小姐

translation.en: For instance, I had an emergency appointment with a doctor today at--
9:00 a.m., West African time.
Again, I apologize.
Now if we can get back to--
translation.zh: 如果我们可以回到主题…

translation.en: [Godswill] No, no. Wait.
You said you had an emergency with the doctor.
translation.zh: 你说你和医生的约定紧急

translation.en: Could you tell us what the emergency was?
translation.zh: 你可以告诉我们什么事情这么紧急？

translation.en: Teeth whitening.
With what paint?
This thing I'm seeing, it can't be whiter.
translation.zh: 依我看来 你的牙齿不能再白了

translation.en: Throwing away your money.
Back to the numbers.
Yes.
Lionheart is in severe debt.
Debt?
[in Igbo] You people are owing.
[in English] Nine hundred and fifteen million Naira.
What?
That's almost one billion!
-[female auditor] No. -Nine hundred and fifteen million Naira.
[female auditor] Your father took a loan from various banks last year.
translation.zh: 你父亲去年从不同银行贷款

translation.en: What was the loan for?
Against our advice.
Chairman took a loan to acquire...
[male auditor] One hundred luxurious buses.
For the BRT contract and now it's time to pay up.
translation.zh: 来签快速公交合同 现在该还钱了

translation.en: Okay.
Okay. Let's not panic. So what do we do?
translation.zh: 我们不要紧张 我们现在该怎么做？

translation.en: [in Igbo] Pay up your debt.
[in English] In 30 days.
Or, risk losing everything.
[female auditor] Good day.
Now, wait, auditor. Auditor.
Auditor.
No, wait, I have something to chip in.
translation.zh: 等一下 我有话想说

translation.en: One billion!
Why would Ernest go to borrow one billion? What for?
translation.zh: 欧内斯特为什么会去借十亿？

translation.en: And without telling me.
In this recession.
Are you sure these people are telling the truth?
translation.zh: 你确定这些人在说实话吗？

translation.en: Well we have to find out. I...
translation.zh: 这是我们需要知道的 我…

translation.en: No, it's time to... Let's reach Odogwu.
translation.zh: 不 现在应该去找领导

translation.en: [Adaeze] So, daddy, the external auditors showed up today,
translation.zh: 爸爸 今天外聘审计员来了

translation.en: talking about a loan that you took last year.
Nine hundred and fifty million Naira, daddy.
Yes, Odogwu. [clears throat]
[in Igbo] I don't know how you took such an amount without telling anybody.
translation.zh: 我不知道你怎么不告诉任何人 就借那么多钱 天呐

translation.en: "A man's response to an urgent matter
translation.zh: “一个人面对紧急情况时的反应

translation.en: determines his character."
Do you understand what I mean?
[in English] We needed buses to improve our fleet. [Godswill] Agreed.
translation.zh: -为了改进我们的车队 我们需要巴士 -我赞同

translation.en: That meant money.
I had no choice but to go to the bank and collect some money.
translation.zh: 我除了去银行借钱 我别无选择

translation.en: -But, daddy-- -You know.
I think you took a huge gamble.
translation.zh: 我认为你冒了很大的风险

translation.en: It's not like we've been guaranteed the BRT contract.
translation.zh: 我们并没有拿下快速公交合同

translation.en: That's another thing. You see, what's so important to me
translation.zh: 那是另一件事 对我来说最重要的

translation.en: is the loan, and how the bank is going to recover--
translation.zh: 是这贷款 银行会怎么把这钱要回去

translation.en: [in Igbo] Their approach is different when recovering their loan.
translation.zh: 他们讨债的方式和借钱不一样

translation.en: [in English] They will go for your blood when they come back.
[in Igbo] There should have been alternatives.
I agree with what you've said.
[in English] I got into this business,
principally to take people to various destinations in comfort...
translation.zh: 就是为了给人提供一个舒适的…

translation.en: in style.
It has become a legacy with our company.
translation.zh: 这已经成为了我们公司的传承

translation.en: If we lose that legacy, we have lost everything.
translation.zh: 如果我们失去了这传承 我们将失去一切

translation.en: Daddy, but right now it seems like we have risked everything.
translation.zh: 爸爸 可我们现在已经冒了失去一切的风险

translation.en: You've put us...
We've been put in such a vulnerable position right now, daddy,
translation.zh: 我们被放在一个非常弱势的地位

translation.en: and we don't have that much time on our side.
translation.zh: 我们手上没有那么多时间了

translation.en: [Ernest] Because of that,
I've decided to invite your Uncle Godswill
translation.zh: 我决定请你叔叔哥斯威

translation.en: to be a part of this establishment,
translation.zh: 来成为我们公司的一部分

translation.en: because I believe that two heads are better than one.
translation.zh: 因为我认为两个头脑胜过一个

translation.en: Let's see what comes out of the fridge, uh?
translation.zh: 我们看看冰箱里能拿出什么

translation.en: -Morning. -Good morning, Ma.
Morning.
Good morning, uncle.
You missed the morning devotion.
I'm sorry. I'm sorry, I was working all night.
translation.zh: 对不起 我整晚都在工作

translation.en: I came up with a plan, uncle.
translation.zh: 我想到了一个计划 叔叔

translation.en: It's something I call my three-point agenda.
translation.zh: 我管它叫我的三点议程

translation.en: Okay. This is good.
-Honestly, I must confess. -Yeah, thank you.
translation.zh: -我要说实话 这非常好 -谢谢你

translation.en: And, here...
take a look.
I've been doing some research myself.
A transport company in Kano
translation.zh: 一个在卡诺的客运公司

translation.en: needs a merger with another company from Southeast,

translation.en: and we must not miss this.

translation.en: I don't think a merger is what we need right now, uncle.

translation.en: Really?
So what do we need?
Trust me.
This is a plan that has been tried and tested.
translation.zh: 这是一个已被测试过的计划

translation.en: It works.
So the first thing we need to do, is get an extension on the 30-day loan.

translation.en: I mean, technically 29 now,

translation.en: and I've asked the accountant to set up meetings with all the banks that we owe.
translation.zh: 我让会计和我们欠款的所有银行 约时间见面

translation.en: And I have one for today which is at...
now, so I have to go.
translation.zh: 就在现在 我得走了

translation.en: We have to go.
No, no, uncle, it's okay, I've got this.
translation.zh: 不 叔叔 没关系 我一个人够了

translation.en: And, besides, you said one of us needs to stay here so--

translation.en: It doesn't apply here. Listen.
translation.zh: 这次不一样 听好了

translation.en: if we have to fight this war, Ada-nna, we have to fight it together,
translation.zh: 要是我们想打赢这场仗 艾达 我们要并肩作战

translation.en: unless we want to lose.
So... I'm at your service, nationwide.
translation.zh: 所以… 不管你到哪 我都会帮你

translation.en: Let's go.
Okay.
I'm afraid I can't give you an extension.
translation.zh: 很抱歉我不能给你们延期

translation.en: [Adaeze] I can assure you we have a solid chance at the deal, we just need more time.
translation.zh: 我向你保证 我们很有机会签这合同 我们只需要更多时间

translation.en: I'm just asking for you to be patient with us.
translation.zh: 我只想请你对我们有点耐心

translation.en: We're definitely going--
[in Igbo] Keep talking.
[in English] Go ahead and talk.
[man] I am so sorry.
It wasn't approved.
[Igwe] Use that against them.
Okay, sir.
But don't rush. Take your time.
Yeah. Okay, sir.
-The minute they get there. -Yeah, I think they're here already.
translation.zh: -他们来的那一刻 -他们好像已经到了

translation.en: Good. Waste their precious time.

translation.en: I'll handle it.
-I do not want to be disturbed. -I'll take care of it, sir.
translation.zh: -我不想被打扰 -我会办好的 先生

translation.en: So, how can I help you, Mr. and Mrs. Obiagu?
translation.zh: 我可以帮你们吗？奥比亚古先生 奥比亚古太太

translation.en: No, no. He's my uncle.
Yes, she's my niece.
Okay, I see.
Anyway, we would like to apply for a loan.
We have the track record.
We have collateral.
But most importantly, we have an impeccable reputation.
translation.zh: 最重要的 我们有一个很好的声誉

translation.en: Lionheart.
Impeccable reputation indeed.
I'm sorry, what's that supposed to mean?
translation.zh: 对不起 你是什么意思？

translation.en: Of course, everyone knows that Lionheart is presently facing bankruptcy.

translation.en: Plus your father, he's owing so many banks.
translation.zh: 加上你父亲欠了那么多银行

translation.en: So how come you're asking for a new loan?
translation.zh: 你们怎么又要申请新的贷款？

translation.en: Well...
We are not facing bankruptcy.
It's just... it's just the times that we're in.
translation.zh: 只是… 现在这个时候

translation.en: It's a minor setback, we'll pull through.
translation.zh: 我们受了一点挫折 我们会挺过去的

translation.en: It's okay, I expect you to say that.
translation.zh: 没关系 我想到你们会这么说

translation.en: Listen, as the manager,
we know the process of obtaining loans.

translation.en: We're not kids.
Just tell us what it will take for us to get this loan. Finished. Simple.

translation.en: Well, I really don't understand.
What don't you understand, for Kingdom's sake?
Look, I give you, you give me.
It's give and take. Everything has a price.

translation.en: Even life has a price. Tell us what it will take.

translation.en: -Uncle, what are you doing? -I'm doing business.
translation.zh: -叔叔 你在做什么？ -我在做生意

translation.en: It's okay, sir, but I hope you are not trying to bribe me.
translation.zh: 好吧 先生 但我希望你不在向我行贿

translation.en: -Oh, God. -Oh, no, no... He's not--
translation.zh: -哦 天呐 -哦 不 他不是…

translation.en: Look, what do you mean by bribe?
translation.zh: 你说的行贿是什么意思？

translation.en: Tell us what you're waiting for,
I will give it to you. I've told you name any price.
translation.zh: 我会给你 我和你说过了 让你开个价

translation.en: It's okay, it's okay. Calm down. You mean?
translation.zh: 没关系 别急 你的意思是？

translation.en: -Name anything. -My price?
Yes, your price.
Well...
your niece here is not looking bad at all.
Excuse me?
I mean, she's good.
My price.
Uncle, you shouldn't have.
translation.zh: 叔叔 你不应该那样

translation.en: [in Igbo] Abomination.
[Igwe] Yes.
Yes.
Yes.
He punched you?
What a savage.
I see.
Which police station?
[Godswill] Hey!
Excuse me.
Do you know the people that you are toying with? Do you?
[in Igbo] You're finished.
[in English] Uncle, please, let's not make things any worse.
translation.zh: 叔叔 求你别把事情闹更遭

translation.en: -They are right, we are wrong. -Says who?
translation.zh: -他们是对的 我们是错的 -谁说的？

translation.en: You can't go about bribing and punching people.
Did I punch him? Was a very sluggish jab.
translation.zh: 我打他了吗？我只是碰了他一下

translation.en: If I had punched him, he would have been in hospital by now.
translation.zh: 我要是打了他 他已经在医院里了

translation.en: He doesn't mean it.
At times a jab, one good punch will make a man come back to his senses.
translation.zh: 有的时候一个拳头能让一个人醒过来

translation.en: [man] Sarge.
Ada. Relax. I know what I'm doing.
translation.zh: 艾达 放心 我知道我在做什么

translation.en: Don't keep blaming me in their presence.
translation.zh: 不要在别人面前指责我

translation.en: Your father knows what I can do and that was why he brought me into this.
translation.zh: 你父亲知道我的能力 这也是他让我来的原因

translation.en: Relax. If I blow hot, you blow cold.
translation.zh: 放心 如果我唱红脸 你就唱白脸

translation.en: So, no one has come for them.
Nobody. Nobody.
-Okay, I'm going for a brief meeting. -Okay, sir.
translation.zh: -好 那我去开个会 -好的 长官

translation.en: -I'll be back. -Yes, sir.
Onyinye! Thank God you're here.
translation.zh: 昂因耶 谢天谢地你来了

translation.en: I can't believe they would actually lock you up in here, like...
translation.zh: 我不敢相信他们真的会把你关起来…

translation.en: Do you know who she be? Do you have any idea--
translation.zh: 你知道她是谁吗？你知不知道…

translation.en: It's, okay, Onyinye, it's fine. I'm okay.
translation.zh: 没关系 昂因耶 我没事了

translation.en: -Just pay the bail money and let's go. -We have a slight problem, Ma.
translation.zh: -把保释金付了 我们走 -我们有个问题 女士

translation.en: There's an emergency board meeting going on right now at the office.
translation.zh: 办公室里正在开紧急董事会

translation.en: -Why? What for? -I don't know.
Approved by who?
Samuel. And Igwe Pascal is in the building.
translation.zh: 是塞缪尔 而且伊贵·帕斯卡也来了

translation.en: Snakes! Scorpions!
Hurry. Pay the money and let's get out of here.
translation.zh: 赶快 付掉保释金 我们走

translation.en: Samuel.
Ada-nna, who's this Igwe Pascal, and what does he want?
translation.zh: 艾达 伊贵·帕斯卡是谁？ 他想要什么？

translation.en: Uncle, I don't know, but whatever it is, I'm sure it's not good.
translation.zh: 叔叔 我不知道 但不管是什么 一定不是好事

translation.en: Madam, he's not letting me pay the bail.
translation.zh: 夫人 他不让我付保释金

translation.en: -Why? -I don't know.
What's the problem?
[in Igbo] Madam, my superior is not around.
translation.zh: 女士 我的上司不在

translation.en: And I can't grant bail if he's not around to sign.
translation.zh: 没有他的签字 我不能保释你们

translation.en: [in English] So, if your boss suddenly dies,
translation.zh: 如果你的上司突然意外死了

translation.en: we will die here because he's not around.
translation.zh: 那我们都得死在这里 因为他不在

translation.en: Well, that's ridiculous. We're ready to go.
translation.zh: 太荒唐了 我们准备好走了

translation.en: Madam, please be patient. [in Igbo] He'll be back soon.
translation.zh: 请你耐心一点 女士 他很快就回来了

translation.en: Come on, release us! Are you crazy?
translation.zh: 让我们出去吧！你疯了吗？

translation.en: -[in English] Release my madam, Officer. -We're ready to pay for bail.
translation.zh: -释放我们夫人 警官 -我们准备好付保释金了

translation.en: Okay, listen, this is an emergency. We need to leave this place so...
translation.zh: 听好 这是一个紧急情况 我们必须得离开…

translation.en: Look, whatever it takes, what do you want?
translation.zh: 不管怎么样 你想要什么？

translation.en: Just name your price, but we need to get out of here, please.
translation.zh: 开个价 但我们得出去 拜托了

translation.en: Ada-nna, is that your voice? You...
translation.zh: 艾达 那是你的声音吗？你…

translation.en: bribe?
Uncle, this is different. Okay, talk to me.
translation.zh: 叔叔 这次不一样 跟我说

translation.en: Madam, I understand.
But the problem is...
[in Igbo] If my superior comes in and he doesn't see a man and a woman here,
translation.zh: 如果我上司进来看不见一男一女

translation.en: -he will dismiss me. -So your arrest is based on arithmetic.
translation.zh: -他会解雇我的 -你们抓人就是基于这个算数？

translation.en: One man, one woman.
Is that what you're telling me?
[in Igbo] Don't worry. A man and a woman right? He will meet a man and a woman.
translation.zh: 别担心 一男一女 对吧？ 他会看见一男一女的

translation.en: [in English] Just open the gate.
My name is...
Igwe Pascal.
It is no more a secret,
that I have an interest in Lionheart.
translation.zh: 已经不再是一个秘密了

translation.en: Unfortunately...
this company...
has lost its vision
and purpose.
Its modus operandi is out of the '40s.
translation.zh: 它的操作模式还是40年代的

translation.en: Gentlemen and ladies,
I am here to bring the change.
[man] Sarge.
[in Igbo] Salute!
[in English] What is he doing here?
And in my father's chair.
Calm down, calm down.
Mr. Igwe Pascal is here because I invited him to come here.
translation.zh: 伊贵·帕斯卡先生前来 是因为受到了我的邀请

translation.en: And also because he...
has something very important to share with the board.
translation.zh: 有很重要的事要告诉董事会

translation.en: Shut that pipe you call mouth!
[in Igbo] No other person will betray the company except an albino rat like you.
translation.zh: 除了你这只白化病鼠以外 没有人会出卖公司的

translation.en: [in English] The board knows about the default on the loan.
translation.zh: 董事会已经知道了拖欠贷款的事

translation.en: How could you keep this from them? How could you be so irresponsible?
translation.zh: 你们怎么能不告诉他们？ 你们怎么可以这么不负责任

translation.en: I... can explain.
It's just a minor setback which we have under control.
translation.zh: 这只是一个小挫折 在我们的掌控中

translation.en: Unfortunately,
Daniel has come to judgment in the person of Mr. Pascal Igwe.
translation.zh: 伊贵·帕斯卡先生给我们带来了 解决问题的办法

translation.en: Now Mr. Pascal Igwe has drawn out a very generous proposal,
translation.zh: 伊贵·帕斯卡先生提出了一个非常 慷慨的建议

translation.en: to buy out Lionheart and incorporate it into IG Motors.
translation.zh: 想收购狮心 并将它合为爱极汽车的一部分

translation.en: A three billion Naira buy-out.
I, for one would take this course of action
translation.zh: 我建议我们要赶快行动

translation.en: very, very quickly given the limited time we have left.
And, let's not forget the recent failures of the Obiagus.
translation.zh: 不要忘记了奥比亚古家近来的失败

translation.en: -I beg your pardon! -But!
I cannot honestly say that I can...
trust the Obiagus' ability to...
provide the kind of leadership this company needs.
translation.zh: 给这公司提供一个称职的领导

translation.en: I was calling you a scorpion, you're worse than a scorpion.
translation.zh: 我刚才还管你叫蝎子 你连蝎子都不如

translation.en: You're a snake.
You're a vampire.
Gentlemen, there is no need for name-calling.
translation.zh: 先生们 我们不必要互相辱骂了

translation.en: I am a busy businessman.
I haven't got time for this.
The bank has given you two weeks.
translation.zh: 银行给了你们两周时间

translation.en: I give you ten days to make up your mind.
translation.zh: 我给你们十天时间来做出决定

translation.en: Good day, gentlemen.
[Samuel] I'll see you off as well.
No, leave him. That's how traitors do.
translation.zh: 让他去 叛徒就是这样

translation.en: Sir, Madam.
Please do not listen to this man.
Look, my father built this company on the core values of courage and trust,
translation.zh: 我父亲是以勇气和信任为核心价值 建立了这公司

translation.en: and I implore you right now to trust me.
translation.zh: 我现在恳求你们信任我

translation.en: My uncle and I have this under control.
translation.zh: 这件事在我和我叔叔的掌控之中

translation.en: You ask us to trust you.
Your family has been less than forthcoming
translation.zh: 你们家对董事会并没有

translation.en: -with the board. -Exactly.
Look, finding out about a loan from an outsider is not encouraging.
translation.zh: 我知道从外人那里得知贷款的消息 这很让人泄气

translation.en: It's not.
-We respect your father. -That's right.
But... for the sake of the future of this company,
translation.zh: 但是… 为了公司的未来

translation.en: We have no choice but to consider Mr. Pascal's offer.
translation.zh: 我们除了考虑帕斯卡先生的提议以外 别无选择

translation.en: Who said you don't have a choice?
We have a choice. Look... And we have just one choice,
translation.zh: 我们有选择… 我们只有一个选择

translation.en: -reject his proposal. -[man] No.
-Refuse his offer. -No!
Please, look, if this company falls into the hands of Igwe Pascal,
translation.zh: 如果这个公司 落入了伊贵·帕斯卡的手中

translation.en: I can assure you it will be a shadow of itself.
translation.zh: 我保证你 公司只会是从前的影子

translation.en: Lionheart will not be the company as you know it today.
translation.zh: 狮心将不再会是你们现在认识的公司

translation.en: Yes.
So, please give us a chance to make things right, please.
translation.zh: 请你们给我们一次将功补过的机会

translation.en: [Godswill] Please.
Igwe gave you ten days, Igwe Pascal.
translation.zh: 伊贵·帕斯卡给了你们十天

translation.en: -Take ten days. -[man 1] Yes.
-Ten days is okay. -That's okay.
-No, Chief, even ten days will-- -We'll take it.
translation.zh: -不 主管 就算十天也… -我们答应

translation.en: -Ten days? -[man 2] I think is rather impromptu--
And, sorry, but in the foreseeable future, gentlemen...
translation.zh: 很抱歉 但在可预见的将来…

translation.en: So...
You don't have to be moody at all. You have...
You have done the best any woman, any man can do.
In fact, what you need now is rest.
Rest? Uncle, this is not the time to rest.
translation.zh: 休息？现在可不是休息的时候 叔叔

translation.en: -Why? -Igwe Pascal is a ruthless business man.
translation.zh: -为什么？ -伊贵·帕斯卡是个无情的生意人

translation.en: He doesn't care about Lionheart, or its people, just its assets.
translation.zh: 他才不在乎狮心或它的员工 他只关心狮心的资产

translation.en: If that man becomes the owner of this company,
translation.zh: 如果他成为了这家公司的老板

translation.en: many people will lose their jobs, I can assure you.
translation.zh: 很多人会失去工作 我敢保证

translation.en: [in Igbo] God Forbid!
[in English] He cannot be. That's number one.
translation.zh: 他不会得逞 这是第一条

translation.en: -What would the families begin to do? -Exactly.
translation.zh: -那些人的家人怎么办呢？ -就是

translation.en: You know you were telling me about your plans.
I want to know all your plans, now.
translation.zh: 我现在要知道你所有的计划

translation.en: I assume that this one is plan one.
translation.zh: 我猜这只是第一个计划

translation.en: Well, I was hoping that the BRT contract would go through.
translation.zh: 我指望快速公交合同能签下来

translation.en: Actually I'm very positive it--
[in Igbo] Ada-nna, the BRT is like a a corporate job. It can't be relied on.
translation.zh: 艾达 这快速公交合同好比任何公司工作 你不能依赖它 它随时可能消失

translation.en: [in English] It can go away at any time.
translation.zh: 你不能依赖它 它随时可能消失

translation.en: Just like marriages of the past...
[in Igbo] where the woman is idle and eats up the wealth of the man.
translation.zh: 那时女人什么都不做 只吃男人的

translation.en: Unlike what is obtainable now.
[in English] Anyway, you might not understand what I'm saying.
translation.zh: 反正你也不懂我在说什么

translation.en: No, I understand fully, uncle.
That's why I work hard for my money. I'm not here to depend on any man to--
translation.zh: 这也是为什么我努力工作赚钱 我不需要任何男人来…

translation.en: Don't get angry, I didn't mean it that way.
translation.zh: 别生气 我不是那个意思

translation.en: I'm not getting angry but I've dated men that...
translation.zh: 我没生气 但我和有些男人交往时 他们…

translation.en: You've dated men that did what?
[in Igbo] Did anyone hurt you?
[in English] Talk to me, I'm your uncle.
translation.zh: 告诉我 我是你叔叔

translation.en: -You have dated men that-- -No, thanks, uncle.
translation.zh: -有些和你约会的男人… -不用了 叔叔

translation.en: But…
I think I know a man we can rely on.
translation.zh: 我认识一个我们可以信赖的人

translation.en: Are you sure?
Arinze!
Who is Arinze?
[Adaeze in English] Excuse me.
Excuse me. Sorry, where's Arinze?
translation.zh: 不好意思 阿仁泽在哪？

translation.en: Thank you.
Uncle?
You know what, you can just wait here. I'll be back.
translation.zh: 你可以在这里等我 我一会回来

translation.en: -No, let me go with you. -No, it's fine.
translation.zh: -不 让我一起去 -不用了 没事的

translation.en: -He's alright. It will only take a minute. -Really?
translation.zh: -他没事 我会很快 -真的吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -Okay. Are you sure you'll be safe?
Hello, how are you?
I'm alright.
-Hey! -Hey.
What a pleasant surprise.
-Hi. -Look at you.
I and my partner, we can supply you with all the vehicles you need.
translation.zh: 我和我搭档可以提供你所需要的车辆

translation.en: This is our inventory. You can go through it.
translation.zh: 这是我们的存货清单 你可以看一下

translation.en: All the model numbers are there.
translation.zh: 所有的车型号码都在上面

translation.en: We can supply to you
only if you can pay that 30% deposit.
Okay.
-Well, how is your dad? -Yeah...
-Hope he's recovering? -Oh, he's much better. Thank you.
translation.zh: -我希望他正在康复 -他现在好多了 谢谢你

translation.en: Thank God.
Okay, I won't, uh, take much of your time so you can get back to your stuff.
translation.zh: 我不耽误你太多时间 你还有事要做

translation.en: Lionheart is in trouble.
Yeah.
And I need a loan.
[man 1 in Igbo] Please can you tell him to hurry up. I want to buy myself a new car.
translation.zh: 可以告诉他快点吗？ 我要给自己买辆新车

translation.en: He should pay up fast.
[man 2] I'm not playing here. I'm a hustler.
translation.zh: 我可不是来玩的 我是个生意人

translation.en: [in English] What did he say?
Oh, he was saying that...
you have a sense of business, he likes your personality.
translation.zh: 你有经营意识 他喜欢你的个性

translation.en: -Ah, thank you, sir. -That you have an eye for good business.
translation.zh: -哦 谢谢你 先生 -说你有做生意的眼光

translation.en: Thank you. I appreciate it.
We are in debt of 950 million.
Yeah. I'm hoping to raise at least a third of it,
translation.zh: 我希望至少能筹集三分之一

translation.en: and if I'm able to get that, then--
translation.zh: 如果我可以拿到那么多…

translation.en: I will give you 500.
What?
You heard me right.
I will give you 500.
You have 500 million just lying about Arinze, really?
translation.zh: 你有那么多闲钱吗？阿仁泽

translation.en: Not really, but I can always work things out.
translation.zh: 不是的 但我可以想出办法来

translation.en: Are you serious?
Of course, I'm very serious.
30% is a little over 100 million.
Sounds too good to be true. I don't know.
translation.zh: 听起来太好了 我不太敢相信

translation.en: [man 2] It's not like that, I'm just doing just a giveaway,
translation.zh: 不是那样的 这是我给你的礼物

translation.en: because this is my first business with you.
translation.zh: 因为这是我们第一次做生意

translation.en: [in Igbo] You need to be mindful of the money so we know our share.
translation.zh: 你需要注意这笔钱 这样我们就知道我们的份额

translation.en: Remember Arinze has a cut.
translation.zh: 别忘了阿仁泽也有一份

translation.en: [man 1] I'm aware. If I had known, I would have added more money.
translation.zh: 我知道 如果我早知道 我就会加钱的

translation.en: [in English] Because he's a nice man. That's why I'm giving it to him.
translation.zh: 因为他是个好人 所以我才给他

translation.en: That's giving a good price. You understand?
translation.zh: 我对他很大方了 你明白吗？

translation.en: [in Igbo] Once he pays...
[in English] Hey!
Arinze! My God. Thank you!
Thank you. I promise you I will pay back every penny.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 我保证每分钱都会还给你的

translation.en: -There is this contract that we're-- -Ada.
Ada, be cool. Enough of all this business talk.
translation.zh: 艾达 别着急 别再谈工作上的事了

translation.en: [in Igbo] What would you like to drink?
[in English] No, I have to go back to the office, I'm on duty so--
translation.zh: 不 我得回办公室 我还有工作…

translation.en: Like, seriously, you go to work like this.
This is, this is a long story. Don't even ask.
translation.zh: 说来话长 还是别问了

translation.en: Now you look so tense.
Arinze I'm not, I'm not tense. I'm...
translation.zh: 阿仁泽 我没有紧张 我…

translation.en: You are tense.
I'm not tense.
You're not?
I don't know you, but if you like your life, you leave now.
translation.zh: 我不认识你 但你要是珍惜你的性命 赶紧走

translation.en: [man 3] I don't... What are you talking about?
These people are not what you think they are.
translation.zh: 这些人不是你想的那样

translation.en: They are swind-- What do you call "shit" at your place?
translation.zh: 他们是骗… 你们那里管“屎”叫什么？

translation.en: Kashi.
These are two pieces of kashi. Very bad ones.
translation.zh: 他们就是两卡西 非常坏

translation.en: The are swindlers. They are here to... I was here, listening to them in Igbo.
translation.zh: 他们是骗子 我站在这里听他们说伊博语

translation.en: You don't understand Igbo. So they are playing you in Igbo.
translation.zh: 你听不懂 所以他们用伊博语玩你

translation.en: -You know what? -Hm?
I think I have something to get you more relaxed.
translation.zh: 我有可以让你更放松的东西

translation.en: Like, like what?
Wait. I'm coming.
translation.zh: 等一下 我马上回来

translation.en: Arinze?
-Don't listen to this man. -Sorry.
-You can see this man is drunk. -No, no.
-Let's do... We can do this business. -No.
translation.zh: -我们… 我们继续谈生意 -不

translation.en: Save your life. Save your money.
translation.zh: 珍惜生命 别浪费钱

translation.en: [man 2] Mr. Hamza. Please, just hold on.
-We can do this business. -No, no.
Look at what you are doing, all this stupid business.
translation.zh: 看看你们在做什么 这些傻事

translation.en: [in Igbo] Tarnishing the image of the Igbo people.
Why don't you go to the secretariat and look for a job?
translation.zh: 你们干嘛不去秘书处找份工作？

translation.en: Change your clothes and go into farming.
Agriculture is thriving right now.
[in English] Go and farm. You are painting us black. Aren't you ashamed?
translation.zh: 去种田吧 你们在玷污我们 你们不感到耻辱吗？

translation.en: [in Igbo] No, no. no.
[man 2 in Igbo] Where are you going?
[Godswill] Where are you going? Have you become a security man?
translation.zh: 你是保安吗？ 你破坏了我们谈生意 现在想跑？

translation.en: [Man 1] You want to run away after disrupting our deal?
translation.zh: 你破坏了我们谈生意 现在想跑？

translation.en: Let me tell you...
We are all Igbo people.
So, Ada...
Ada?
[Man 2] You will have to pay us 30% of the money.
Really?
Yes. You hit him well.
-[in English] Ada-nna. -Uncle, we need to go.
Yeah, good idea.
[in Igbo] Remain on the ground. Stupid man.
[Adaeze] Director.
Hello, sir, good afternoon.
translation.zh: 你好 先生 下午好

translation.en: I was just coming to see you. Did you get my e-mails?
translation.zh: 我是来见你的 你收到我的邮件了吗？

translation.en: -Yes, yes I did. -Okay.
But unfortunately,
there's little I can do right now.
The EFCC is investigating us as we speak.
translation.zh: 我们正被经济和金融犯罪委员会调查

translation.en: The Perm Sec has been placed on compulsory leave,
translation.zh: 常任秘书已被强制休假

translation.en: and between you and me, he's not coming back.
translation.zh: 我跟你私下说 他不会回来了

translation.en: So, as it stands now,
I don't have idea of the fate of the BRT project.
translation.zh: 我不清楚快速公交项目 会往什么方向发展

translation.en: Oh, my God.
[in Igbo] It's only God that can save us from this mess.
[in English] Thank you.
Madam, I'm very sorry.
My apologies to your father.
This is the change we all believe in.
translation.zh: 这是我们都相信的改变

translation.en: Good morning, Ma.
[in Igbo] Hello. Onyinye?
Is anything wrong?
She didn't come to work?
[in English] Leave me alone.
I'm not hungry.
[Abigail] My friend, I'm coming in.
translation.zh: 我的朋友 我要进来了

translation.en: Mummy?
Yes, dear.
[in Igbo] I heard you didn't go to work.
[Adaeze in English] I'm not feeling well.
You're not feeling well.
[in Igbo] Onyinye called me.
[in English] I'm so tired, mummy.
I'm exhausted.
What is really the problem?
I can't get an extension on the loans.
BRT contract is not forthcoming.
And if this... Igwe Pascal man gets a hold of our company,
translation.zh: 如果让伊贵·帕斯卡这种人掌控了 我们公司

translation.en: everyone will lose their jobs.
And they are depending on me, and I feel like I'm failing.
translation.zh: 他们都指望着我 可我感觉我快撑不住了

translation.en: You have not started and you feel like such a failure?
translation.zh: 你都没开始就感觉失败了？

translation.en: Do you know what your father put into setting up this company?
translation.zh: 你知道你父亲为了建立这公司付出了 多少吗？

translation.en: The challenges, the mistakes, the failures he had to face?
translation.zh: 他面对过挑战 错误 失败

translation.en: And yet he made it.
What is it they say?
It's not over till it's over.
Yes but, mummy, I'm running out of ideas. I don't know what to do.
translation.zh: 可是妈妈 我想不出来其他办法了 我不知道该怎么做

translation.en: God never gives you a burden he has not equipped you to carry.
translation.zh: 上帝不会让你承担你还没有准备好 担当的重量

translation.en: What should I do?
What can I do?
You have your father's business brains. You're a businesswoman.
translation.zh: 你有你父亲的生意头脑 你是个女生意人

translation.en: Do away with the sentiments and the emotions.
And get the job done. You have it in you.
Dig deep and get it.
You've always been able to do anything you put your mind to.
translation.zh: 你只要上心 你总能成功

translation.en: You can do this.
Thank you, mummy.
You can do this, you're gonna be alright.
translation.zh: 你可以做到的 你不会有事的

translation.en: Listen, get dressed, come to the house
translation.zh: 听着 穿上衣服 到家里来

translation.en: and let's have a nice meal.
Your auntie Chioma is around and she's been asking for you.
translation.zh: 你的秋玛婶婶来了 她问你在哪里

translation.en: -She is? -Yeah.
She came to see her husband. You know those two,
translation.zh: 她来看她丈夫了 你知道他们俩

translation.en: they never stay away from each other for too long.
Come on, get dressed.
-Okay, I'll see you there. -Alright.
translation.zh: -好 那我一会儿过来 -好的

translation.en: Good evening.
-Oh, Ada-nna. -Aunty.
[in Igbo] Ada... You are looking beautiful.
translation.zh: -艾达 你看上去真美 -谢谢

translation.en: What?
She looks tiny. Are you people feeding her?
translation.zh: 她太瘦了 你们给她吃东西吗？

translation.en: Can't you see food everywhere? You ask if she is being fed.
translation.zh: 你没看见到处是吃的吗？你还问

translation.en: Don't allow your father and uncle to tear you apart.
translation.zh: 别为了你父亲和你叔叔左右为难

translation.en: Take it easy.
Please don't blame anybody. She goes to the gym.
translation.zh: 谁也别怪 她去健身房

translation.en: Gym?
Fashion. That's the trend these days.
Fitness.
I heard the first daughter of John Bosco
translation.zh: 我听说约翰·鲍思高的大女儿

translation.en: is getting married next month.
John Bosco looked at his son-in-law
translation.zh: 约翰·鲍思高看到了他女婿

translation.en: and felt he looked really skinny.
He then asked him,
"Can you take care of my daughter looking this way?"
translation.zh: “你这个样子能照顾我女儿吗？”

translation.en: He replied,
"My in-law, it is all in God's hands."
translation.zh: “我的岳父 这都是在上帝的掌握之中”

translation.en: John Bosco replied, "I have heard you."
translation.zh: 约翰·鲍思高回答 “我听到你了”

translation.en: Let me tell you the truth…
You don't understand what the son-in-law meant...
translation.zh: 你们不明白那女婿什么意思

translation.en: The God he was referring to, was John Bosco.
translation.zh: 他指的上帝就是约翰·鲍思高

translation.en: He will call him God-John Bosco if you let him.
translation.zh: 甚至会称呼他岳父为上帝

translation.en: It's not a lie.
That's young men of today.
translation.zh: 现在的年轻人都是这样

translation.en: Saying it is in the hands of God implies it is in the hands of John Bosco.
translation.zh: 说是在上帝的掌握之中就意味着是在 约翰·鲍思高的掌握之中

translation.en: John Bosco is God.
Let me tell you, that's what we suffer nowadays.
When a young man wants to marry...
translation.zh: 我们现在正受这事折磨

translation.en: he'll first ask around if the parents are wealthy.
translation.zh: 当一个小青年想结婚时… 他会问对方父母有没有钱

translation.en: If both the parents are not wealthy, he disappears.
translation.zh: 如果对方父母没钱 他会立马走人

translation.en: He's gone.
My sister, it is just tiring. It's too much.
translation.zh: 太辛苦 太麻烦了 姐姐

translation.en: That's how a child will carry on something too heavy to handle.
translation.zh: 这会让一个孩子承受到 他担当不起的压力

translation.en: My dear, if such a man comes for you... run!
translation.zh: 亲爱的 如果有这样的一个男人想追你…

translation.en: Make sure your feet hit your ears as you run.
[Godswill] It is not that you see a man and start running...
because you might be in this sort of race and run past your future husband...
translation.zh: 因为你有可能错过你未来的丈夫…

translation.en: then, we won't get to drink on your wedding day.
translation.zh: 这样我们就喝不到你的喜酒了

translation.en: How it is done is that, first, you study the man...
if he is a reasonable person, you accept him.
translation.zh: 你要首先研究这男人… 如果他性格不错 你可以接受他

translation.en: But if it's any of those men that sag their trousers to their knees...
translation.zh: 但如果是那种把裤裆拉到膝盖的…

translation.en: Run!
Because these children feel like they are of marriageable age...
translation.zh: 因为那些孩子 以为自己到了结婚年龄…

translation.en: "If a child tried to tie a wrapper before maturity, when the wind comes--
translation.zh: “如果一个孩子试图在成熟之前 把自己包装 当风来时

translation.en: [Abigail] It will blow him away along with the wrapper."
translation.zh: 风会把他连同包装纸一起吹跑”

translation.en: Obiora, you have heard what they said. What do you want to do with your life?
translation.zh: 奥比奥拉 你听到他们说的了 你这辈子想做什么？

translation.en: What sort of question is that? [Godswill] He asked you a question.
translation.zh: -这算什么问题？ -他只是问你个问题

translation.en: So the music I am into isn't beneficial to my life?
translation.zh: 我喜欢的音乐对我人生不好吗？

translation.en: I'm a musician. You've always known this is what I do.
translation.zh: 我是个音乐家 你知道我是做这个的

translation.en: Music is your choice of profession?
translation.zh: 你选择音乐做你的职业？

translation.en: You know you are Igbo?
Essentially, every day you move around with an instrument
translation.zh: 你每天打着音乐的旗号

translation.en: all in the name of music?
[Obiora] Was Osadebe not an Igbo man?
translation.zh: 欧萨迪巴不是伊博人吗？

translation.en: Is it not his music you always play in this house?
translation.zh: 你不是一直在家里放他的歌吗？

translation.en: Chief, he got you there!
translation.zh: 老大 他把你问住了！

translation.en: [Ernest] You win.
You win, before I choke.
translation.zh: 你赢了 我没力气和你争

translation.en: At least I have not gone to jail like Ada and Uncle Goddy.
translation.zh: 至少我没有像艾达和哥斯威叔叔 一样坐过牢

translation.en: Leave me out of it.
Obiora,
you cannot go to jail.
[Godswill] You look like a new baby's bath water.
translation.zh: 你看起来像婴儿的洗澡水

translation.en: If you go to jail, will you come out alive?
See your beard looking like that of Nebuchadnezzar.
translation.zh: 你的胡子像尼布甲尼撒一样

translation.en: It will be the first thing they shave with a bottle.
translation.zh: 一定会最先被他们用玻璃瓶刮掉

translation.en: [Obiora] At least I look like my father with the beard.
translation.zh: 至少我的胡子还像我父亲

translation.en: You know I support you, but I'm just telling you the truth.
translation.zh: 你知道我支持你 但我得和你说实话

translation.en: Are you saying I don't work hard?
translation.zh: 你是说我不努力工作吗？

translation.en: Please, let's eat, before I choke on pepper.
translation.zh: 我们吃饭吧 我快被辣椒呛到了

translation.en: Hi daddy.
[in Igbo] Ada, how are you?
[in English] I'm good.
How are you?
Well, I am grateful to God for my life.
translation.zh: 我很感谢上帝给了我生命

translation.en: But you see there comes a time in the life of a man
when he decides to take stock.
translation.zh: 会有他反省自己的时候

translation.en: I've come to realize that most men invest all their time
translation.zh: 我发现大多数人把他们的时间投入在

translation.en: in matters of transient value,
translation.zh: 只在瞬间有价值的东西上

translation.en: at the expense of what they should cherish,
translation.zh: 却放弃了他们应该珍惜

translation.en: what they should value,
like love,
life,
family.
I waited eight years for you to be born.
Those were years of trepidation.
And you came and you became a source of pride and joy to me.
translation.zh: 然后你出生了 你就成为了我的骄傲 和快乐的源泉

translation.en: I have watched you grow,
and I'm so confident in your ability.
translation.zh: 我对你的能力很有信心

translation.en: The biggest legacy...
I would leave for posterity...
is you.
My daughter.
I'm not thinking about death, but...
translation.zh: 我没在想死的事 但是…

translation.en: Marie Connely said, "In the midst of life we are in death,"
translation.zh: 玛丽·康纳里说过 “活着的时候 我们也在死里”

translation.en: so occasionally when we talk about life, there's always death hovering around.
translation.zh: 当我们谈及生活的时候 死亡就在周围

translation.en: You are the pendulum of my life.
If you stop swinging,
then I am done.
I'm proud of you. You mean so much to me. Come on. Come on.
translation.zh: 我以你为荣 你对我来说非常重要

translation.en: Thank you, daddy.
I'm proud of you, I'm proud of you.
I'm proud of you. Yeah. Sit down.
translation.zh: 我以你为荣 来 坐下

translation.en: [in Igbo] Please help me.
Madam, if you want to go straight to Lagos, get into the bus.
translation.zh: 女士 如果你想直接去拉各斯 那就上车

translation.en: But if you intend on stopping in Sagamu, then go to Lionheart.
translation.zh: 但如果你想在沙加穆停下 就去找狮心

translation.en: This bus is going straight to Lagos. We are not stopping over at Sagamu.
translation.zh: 这班车直接到拉各斯 我们不会在沙加穆停下

translation.en: Why will you tell me to go to Lionheart and pay 6,000 Naira
translation.zh: 你为什么让我去找狮心 花六千奈拉

translation.en: when my destination is Sagamu? Am I going to Lagos?
translation.zh: 我只想去沙加穆 我又不是去拉各斯

translation.en: Madam.
Since you knew you were going to Sagamu, you should have come here on time.
translation.zh: 既然你知道你要去沙加穆 那就应该准时来

translation.en: The vehicles that travel to Sagamu left the park already.
translation.zh: 前往沙加穆的车已经出发了

translation.en: If you want to go to Lagos, then get into the bus. If not, please leave.
translation.zh: 如果你想去拉各斯就上车 不然请你走

translation.en: This is the Peace Express to Lagos. We don't make multiple stops.
translation.zh: 本次公车是前往拉各斯的快速班车 我们将不会在途中过多停靠

translation.en: -[in English] Morning, morning. -Morning, Ma.
Not now. Get the GM.
translation.zh: 现在不行 去找总经理

translation.en: I want all available drivers assembled in the meeting hall. Now.
translation.zh: 我要所有能找到的司机 马上在会议厅集合

translation.en: -Okay. -Morning.
[man 1 in Igbo] They're faster.
We can't navigate those narrow roads.
translation.zh: 我们无法在这些狭窄的路上开

translation.en: [man 2] Ask the small bus drivers, they know!
translation.zh: 问那些开小巴士的司机 他们知道！

translation.en: The small buses are always at full capacity.
[man 3] Our fares are too expensive.
How much is it?
Our big buses cannot compete.
translation.zh: 我们的大巴士无法竞争

translation.en: Not on speed, routes, rates... nothing!
translation.zh: 在速度 路线 收费 各个方面都没法比！

translation.en: Our passengers are becoming impatient.
translation.zh: 我们的乘客已经开始没有耐心了

translation.en: [man 4] The small bus companies are killing us right now.
translation.zh: 这些小巴士公司正在扼杀我们

translation.en: [man 5] To reduce our rates, we should invest in small buses.
translation.zh: 我们需要投资小巴士 来降低我们的票价

translation.en: [Godswill in English] Ada-nna.
You look moody. Why?
translation.zh: 你看上去有心事 怎么了？

translation.en: Let's just say...
I now understand what you've been talking about all this while.
translation.zh: 我终于明白这段时间你一直在说什么

translation.en: Well, I'm happy you eventually realize it.
translation.zh: 我很高兴你终于明白了

translation.en: The major thing is to understand at your own time. It's good.
translation.zh: 最重要的是你自己想通了 这非常好

translation.en: Where we going to get small buses from?
translation.zh: 我们要从哪里弄来那些小巴士呢？

translation.en: We can't afford to buy any more buses at this time.
translation.zh: 我们目前买不起更多的巴士了

translation.en: Yes, we can't afford to buy it, but where...
translation.zh: 没错 我们买不起 可是我们…

translation.en: we can achieve it.
You know.
I talked to you once.
Maikano Motors.
They have been looking for a way to enter the East.
translation.zh: 在找一个进入东部地区的方法

translation.en: Maybe if we push for the merger with them, it's solved.
translation.zh: 如果我们要求和他们公司合并 问题也许可以解决

translation.en: Maikano Motors is a very big transport company, uncle.
translation.zh: 麦卡诺汽车公司是一个 很大的客运公司 叔叔

translation.en: I know.
I don't know if they'll go with the idea of a merger.
translation.zh: 我不确定他们会同意公司合并

translation.en: Why not?
Listen, this is one thing that they have been looking for,
translation.zh: 听好 这是他们寻求了很久的

translation.en: for a very long time, to enter the East.
translation.zh: 一件事情 他们想进入东部

translation.en: Preferably with a reputable and big transport company,
translation.zh: 最好是和一个声誉好的 大客运公司合作

translation.en: which we are.
So...
They find what they're looking for,
translation.zh: 他们会找到他们想要的

translation.en: and they have the small buses we are looking for, so...
translation.zh: 同时 他们有我们需要的小巴士

translation.en: [in Igbo] "Since the food is delicious, the soup looks good,
translation.zh: “既然食物很美味 汤看起来不错

translation.en: what stops the visitor from eating?"
[in English] Okay.
I think it's worth a try.
Good.
I'll get them to set up a meeting and then we'll--
translation.zh: 我会让他们安排碰面 然后我们…

translation.en: No, no, no, no...
-Don't be so fast, Ada. -What?
[in Igbo] "You need to take out the log of wood from the top
before the one below."
[in English] If you understand my gist.
-No, no, no! -Odogwu--
Nobody will take my company away from me. Nobody! No.
translation.zh: 没人可以将我的公司从我手里夺走

translation.en: It is a merger. Nobody's taking your company away from you.
translation.zh: 这只是合并 没有人会夺走你的公司

translation.en: What is the difference between a merger, and what Igwe Pascal propose? Tell me.
translation.zh: 这种合并与伊贵·帕斯卡的提议 有什么区别？

translation.en: Well, Igwe Pascal wants to buy us out.
translation.zh: 伊贵·帕斯卡想要收购我们公司

translation.en: And we both know that will be the end of Lionheart if he did.
translation.zh: 我们都知道 如果那样狮心就完了

translation.en: But with a merger
with Maikano we can still,
translation.zh: 与麦卡诺合并 我们依然能

translation.en: have some sort of control over our destiny.
translation.zh: 对我们的命运有所掌控

translation.en: [in Igbo] Chief, listen to what your daughter is saying.
translation.zh: 领导 听你女儿说的

translation.en: [in English] Listen to her. We have run out of options completely.
translation.zh: 听她说 我们已经别无选择了

translation.en: They will not grant us extension on this loan.
translation.zh: 他们不会批准贷款延期

translation.en: And no bankers want to give us any other loan as it stands now.
translation.zh: 没有银行现在会给我们发放贷款

translation.en: So it's either Maikano, or Igwe Pascal, which we don't want.
translation.zh: 所以除了伊贵·帕斯卡 我们只能选择麦卡诺

translation.en: And, they are Hausa?
Daddy, come on, this is business.
translation.zh: 爸爸 别计较了 这是生意

translation.en: Alright.
What if Maikano does not accept our terms? You tell me.
translation.zh: 如果麦卡诺拒绝我们的条件怎么办？ 你说

translation.en: Oh, daddy, leave that to me.
translation.zh: 放心吧 爸爸 我会处理的

translation.en: Leave that to us.
[in Igbo] "Throw the bone to us dogs and leave the fight to us and the spirits."
translation.zh: “把骨头扔给我们这些狗吧 把战斗留给我们和灵魂”

translation.en: [in English] We can do it. You have said it yourself.
translation.zh: 我们能做到的 你自己说了

translation.en: Odogwu.
Yeah.
...such as for...
We request...
They, to apply the application...
Sorry to interrupt you.
You remember me?
The house with the pool with all the women.
translation.zh: 在那有泳池和很多女人的房子

translation.en: -House with the pool... -You saved me from being duped
translation.zh: -有泳池的房子… -我差点被那帮骗子骗了

translation.en: by those fraudsters.
-How are you? -I'm very well.
It's a small world.
Hey, you know, I never got a chance to thank you the other day.
-Yes. -I'm glad I have the opportunity
translation.zh: -是的 -我很高心现在有这样一个

translation.en: -to express my gratitude now. -No, you don't need
translation.zh: -感谢你的机会 -不 你不必担心

translation.en: to worry yourself. Just do good to any human being you see anywhere
translation.zh: 你只要对任何你看到的人好就行了

translation.en: because you never know what tomorrow will turn out to be.
translation.zh: 因为你不知道明天会是什么样的一天

translation.en: -You're right. Thank you very much. -It turned out well. -Thank you. -[Adaeze clears throat]
translation.zh: -你说得对 非常感谢你 -结果还不错 谢谢

translation.en: Sorry. Meet my niece. Adaeze.
translation.zh: 不好意思 这是我的侄女艾达丝

translation.en: -It's a pleasure. -Pleased to meet you.
So where are you both headed?
We are... actually, we're going to Kano.
translation.zh: 我们… 其实我们要去卡诺

translation.en: Oh wow. I hope all is well.
translation.zh: 哇 我希望你们一切顺利

translation.en: All is well. We want to meet...
translation.zh: 一切很好 我们要去见…

translation.en: one business mogul in Kano.
You know, Alhaji Maikano.
Want to see if we can strike a deal with him.
Have you met him before?
No, no, no, no. But I intend to see him when I get to Kano.
translation.zh: 没有 但是我到了卡诺 就要见他

translation.en: -Wow. -Yes.
Well, let me introduce myself. My name is Hamza Maikano.
translation.zh: 让我自我介绍一下 我名叫哈姆萨·麦卡诺

translation.en: -Hamza who? -Yes.
The man over there is my father. Alhaji Danladi Maikano.
translation.zh: 那里的那位就是我父亲 阿拉吉·达拉第·麦卡诺

translation.en: Maikano of Maikano Transport?
translation.zh: 麦卡诺客运公司的那个麦卡诺？

translation.en: Yes.
-What? -We are actually on our way to Kano.
translation.zh: -什么？ -我们正在去卡诺的路上

translation.en: So you can come with us. I will make an introduction.
translation.zh: 你们可以和我们一起去 我来做引荐

translation.en: -And I can help you with your bags. -Yes, yes.
Wow!
Not now, uncle, wait.
translation.zh: 不是现在 叔叔 等一下

translation.en: Ada-nna.
You will discuss with this man alone. I will stay on the flank.
translation.zh: 你单独和他谈话 我会在你侧面

translation.en: [in Igbo] But uncle, we are meant to be in this together.
translation.zh: 但是我们应该并肩作战

translation.en: I know we are in this together.
translation.zh: 我知道我们应该并肩作战

translation.en: [in English] But look, you are a leader. He sees a leader.
translation.zh: 但你是个领导 他看到的是一个领导

translation.en: Leadership is not easy.
Talk with him one on one.
The head of one organization
versus the head of the other organization.
[in Igbo] Go, don't be scared. I am around.
translation.zh: 去吧 别害怕 我就在附近

translation.en: Okay.
Don't be scared.
-You're welcome. -Yeah, thank you.
Do have a seat, Miss Obiagu.
translation.zh: 请坐 奥比亚古小姐

translation.en: -Thank you, sir. -Yeah.
So, how is your father?
I've not met him, but he has quite a reputation.
translation.zh: 我没见过他 不过他有很高的声誉

translation.en: Well, he's doing very well. Thank you for asking.
So what can I do for you?
Well, sir, I'm aware you are trying to enter the Eastern region.
translation.zh: 我知道你很想进入东部地区

translation.en: Well, I'm here to let you know
Lionheart Transport is willing to make your transition a smooth one.
translation.zh: 狮心客运愿意努力 使您有一个顺利的过渡

translation.en: Really?
Yes, we have a fleet of 200 buses
translation.zh: 是的 我们拥有200辆巴士

translation.en: and cater to over 50,000 people weekly,
translation.zh: 每周的客运量达到五万人次

translation.en: not to mention 30 years of experience that we have under our belt.
translation.zh: 而且我们拥有30年的经验

translation.en: So I think that...
if there was some sort of merger between your company and ours,
translation.zh: 如果贵公司和我们公司 可以有某种合并

translation.en: I think the sky will be the limit, sir.
That sounds like a well-rehearsed pitch, my dear.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 这听起来是个 排练得很不错的推销

translation.en: It's not a pitch, sir.
Then convince me. Why should my company match with yours?
translation.zh: 那就说服我 为什么我的公司 要和你们的公司联姻？

translation.en: Well, sir...
I grew up in a bus park.
My father started taking me to work way before I could crawl.
translation.zh: 我还没会爬之前 我爸爸就带我去上班

translation.en: I saw people come and go,
each with their own different agendas.
translation.zh: 每个人都有自己不同的历程

translation.en: [Adaeze] You see,
family is a core value upon which Lionheart was built.
translation.zh: 狮心建立在家庭这一核心价值之上

translation.en: I understood this early and as I've grown older,
translation.zh: 我很早就明白这一点 等我长大了

translation.en: I have realized that our growth is based on how we treat others.
translation.zh: 我意识到我们的成长 基于我们如何对待彼此

translation.en: The same way you have, sir.
translation.zh: 先生 你们也是如此

translation.en: Your grandfather built Maikano Motors 65 years ago.
translation.zh: 你的祖父65年前建立了 麦卡诺汽车公司

translation.en: Then he passed it on to your father and now, you wear the crown.
translation.zh: 然后他把它传给了你的父亲 现在你是掌门人

translation.en: You do understand the importance of succession and longevity.
translation.zh: 你理解承袭和长久的重要性

translation.en: You've done quite some research.
Sir.
Maikano motors is one of the leading transport companies.
translation.zh: 麦卡诺汽车公司是领先的客运公司

translation.en: I mean with emphasis to the North.
But, Lionheart Transportation is the heart and the soul of the Southeast.
translation.zh: 狮心客运是东南部的灵魂

translation.en: My belief is that...
with your capital
and our technical know-how,
if we come together as one,
we would be a force to be reckoned within the transportation business.
translation.zh: 我们将成为运输业 一股不可忽视的力量

translation.en: And not to mention...
most importantly, we share the same values.
translation.zh: 最重要的就是我们拥有同样的价值观

translation.en: [Hamza] So, how did it go with my father?
translation.zh: 你和我爸爸谈得怎么样？

translation.en: [Adaeze] Reasonably well, I believe.
Though he says he has to think on it, so, fingers crossed.
translation.zh: 他说还要考虑一下 希望一切顺利

translation.en: [Hamza] He's never been one to make hasty decision.
translation.zh: 他从来不会做仓促的决定

translation.en: No, he said the same thing.
translation.zh: 是 他也是这样说的

translation.en: But I really do believe that this would be a mutually beneficial deal
translation.zh: 但我确实相信这将是一个互利的交易

translation.en: if it does go through.
I... I think so too.
So thank you.
I don't know if I have thanked you for everything.
translation.zh: 我不知道我是否为这一切感谢过你

translation.en: We wouldn't have come this far if you hadn't, you know--
translation.zh: 你知道…如果没有你 我们不会有这样的机会

translation.en: Stop. Stop thanking me. I know exactly what it's like to be in your shoes.
translation.zh: 不要谢我 我完全了解你是什么感受

translation.en: Is that so? How come?
You see, for starters, this isn't just a business for you.
translation.zh: 首先 这对你来说不仅仅是个生意

translation.en: This is personal.
This is your family.
This is about proving your worth to anyone who matters, especially your dad.
translation.zh: 这是为了向你在意的人 特别是你的父亲 证明你的价值

translation.en: I know what it's like to be living under their shadows.
translation.zh: 我知道在他们的阴影下生活 是什么感觉

translation.en: They've done so much for us on a platter, and the only way...
translation.zh: 我们没费力就得到了很多 唯一能够

translation.en: to pay them back is to show that we can actually bring something to the table.
translation.zh: 回报的就是让他们知道 我们也能创造价值

translation.en: How did you think I ended up in Enugu, almost scammed in a business
translation.zh: 你知道为什么我会在埃努古？ 我想去解决我们通往东部的路线 差点被骗了

translation.en: I hoped would solve our in-roads to the East?
translation.zh: 我想去解决我们通往东部的路线 差点被骗了

translation.en: I wanted to impress him so bad and earn his respect.
translation.zh: 我太想得到他的认可 赢得他的尊重

translation.en: So yes, I understand.
So no need to keep thanking me.
I'm sure your father is proud of you.
translation.zh: 我相信你父亲以你为荣

translation.en: We have to be going.
it's getting late and...
translation.zh: 太晚了 我们赶不上最后一班飞机了

translation.en: we can't make the last flight so we have to check into a hotel.
translation.zh: 太晚了 我们赶不上最后一班飞机了 我们要找酒店入住 你能…

translation.en: -Can you rec-- -No, no,your things are in the car.
translation.zh: 不用 你们的东西都在车上

translation.en: I have instructed the driver to take you to our guest house.
translation.zh: 我已经告诉司机 带你们去我们的招待所

translation.en: -No, please, you've done enough already. -I insist.
translation.zh: -不用 你已经为我们做了很多 -听我的吧

translation.en: Thank you.
You're welcome.
Thank you.
Thank you so much and Alhaji and we'll be hoping to hear from you.
translation.zh: 非常感谢 阿拉吉 我们期待你的答复

translation.en: -It's okay. -Yes.
Alright, Adaeze.
[in Igbo] Did they provide transportation for us?
Yes. It's taking us to their guest house.
translation.zh: 是的 带我们去他们的招待所

translation.en: [in English] Thank you, Alhaji. Thank you. Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 谢谢 阿拉吉 非常感谢

translation.en: Kola.
Thank you.
[in Igbo] What's going on?
[in English] Nothing.
Honestly, your father is so stubborn.
translation.zh: 老实说 你爸爸太固执了

translation.en: I heard you're getting better.
Of course I'm getting better. Can't you see that?
translation.zh: 我当然不错 你看不出来吗？

translation.en: I'm not expected to die anytime soon.
I'm getting better.
[in Hausa] The way things are turning out, I'll have to sleep over in this town.
translation.zh: 看事情的发展 我得要在这个镇上过夜了

translation.en: If you need a place to stay,
translation.zh: 要是你需要地方住的话

translation.en: I also have a guest house.
You understand Hausa?
I was born in Zaria.
I studied there.
We roamed the city.
To be honest, I enjoyed the yoghurt... and the millet cakes.
translation.zh: 说实话 我很喜欢酸奶和小米蛋糕

translation.en: That's surprising.
It was us against the world.
[in English] You have to do something, because we're going to...
translation.zh: 你要做点什么 因为我们就要…

translation.en: O... kay.
I promise you, they weren't doing that a minute ago.
translation.zh: 我保证 他们一分钟前还不是这样的

translation.en: Ada-nna, why do you get yourself worked up for nothing?
They are laughing. They are smiling, they are happy.
translation.zh: 他们在大笑 一定很开心

translation.en: I see that.
No worries, let me join them.
translation.zh: 别担心了 我过去和他们一起

translation.en: Right, I think it's about time we started this meeting.
translation.zh: 好 我想可以开始开会了

translation.en: -There's no point in waiting any longer. -Yes.
-Go ahead. -Three billion now is not something,
you know, to pass on.
translation.zh: 什么可以轻易回绝的东西

translation.en: [Obiagu] Not so fast, not so fast.
Get out of this seat. Come on.
-Out. -Out of this seat.
Please, sit.
-[man] Mr. Chairman, welcome. -Thank you very much.
translation.zh: -主席先生 欢迎你 -非常感谢

translation.en: [Samuel] Chief.
What a surprise, Sir.
Yes, a wonderful surprise.
Anybody who is on trial
is offered an opportunity to defend himself
translation.zh: 都有机会在控诉者面前

translation.en: before his accusers, don't you think so?
translation.zh: 为自己辩护 你觉得呢？

translation.en: Yes, Chief, but you are not under any trial here sir.
translation.zh: 是的 老大 不过没有谁要审判你

translation.en: No, no, no. Come on, I'm under trial.
translation.zh: 不 别扯了 我在受到审判

translation.en: You...
you accused my family of...
incompetence, of ineptitude,
and not satisfied with that,
to make matters worse,
you bring into my family this, this poor chap, this, this, this rascal.
translation.zh: 你把这个家伙 这个流氓 带到我的家人里来

translation.en: Chief Obiagu,
there is no need for name-calling here.
This is business.
No hard feelings.
No hard feelings.
[in Igbo] Pascal, you're an animal.
translation.zh: 帕斯卡 你是个畜生

translation.en: [in English] Insult me all you want. But...
translation.zh: 随便你怎么骂我 但是…

translation.en: it will not change what is about to happen here.
translation.zh: 将要发生的事情不会改变

translation.en: My offer is up...
and you have lost.
If I were you, I wouldn't be too sure.
translation.zh: 如果我是你 我不会这么确定

translation.en: You read it carefully.
Sorry, what, what, what's this?
It might help if you read.
Contract papers. We have a new offer on the table.
translation.zh: 是合同文件 我们现在有新的出价了

translation.en: In the past 30 years,
my family has...
faced up to all sorts of challenges.
We are faced with another challenge.
translation.zh: 我们现在面临着另一个挑战

translation.en: The challenge, more trying this time,
translation.zh: 这次的挑战 更难对付

translation.en: the challenge of change.
This talks about expansion.
You don't have the capital for that.
You think so?
Yes, I know so.
Adaeze.
Ladies and gentlemen, I would like to introduce to you
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们 我向你们介绍

translation.en: the newest shareholder of Lionheart.
Alhaji Danladi Maikano, and his son, Hamza.
translation.zh: 阿拉吉·达拉第·麦卡诺 和他的儿子哈姆萨

translation.en: That's impossible.
Really?
We've struck a deal with Maikano Motors, to combine our fleet.
translation.zh: 我们与麦卡诺汽车公司 达成协议 合并我们的车队

translation.en: If you look at the contracts before you,
translation.zh: 如果你看看面前的合同

translation.en: you will see that this is a mutually beneficial merger.
translation.zh: 你会发现这是一个互惠互利的合并

translation.en: One that allows us to explore and expand beyond the shores
translation.zh: 我们不用买小型巴士就可以

translation.en: without having to buy small buses.
translation.zh: 开发并拓展更大的市场

translation.en: But, most importantly,
it allows us to retain control of Lionheart.
translation.zh: 它允许我们保留对狮心的控制权

translation.en: Beautiful. Wonderful.
This is...
absolute rubbish.
Sam.
[in Igbo] Are you still here?
-[in English] Get up! And out. -Your continued stay
is an extension of your irrelevance.
translation.zh: 只会更加显得你无关紧要

translation.en: Could you leave, please?
Beautiful baby.
[in English] Please.
Welcome, Maikano.
Thank you, my brother.
At this point, I must have to make an announcement.
I want to retire from my position
of MD and CEO
of this company.
I think I have groomed a successor,
translation.zh: 我想我已经培养了一个继任者

translation.en: my daughter Adaeze,
because I believe she has all the virtues
required to run this company.
translation.zh: 经营这家公司需要的所有的优良品德

translation.en: In order to ensure that I am not inflicting her on you,
translation.zh: 为了确保我不是把她强加给你们

translation.en: you just must might put this to vote, if you'd like to.
translation.zh: 如果你们愿意的话 可以投票

translation.en: -[Godswill] Oh, yes. Yes. -But I recommend her heavily.
translation.zh: -哦 好 -但是我强烈推荐她

translation.en: Why not.
All in support say "aye."
[everyone] Aye.
The ayes have it. There's no "nay."
translation.zh: 都是赞成 没有人反对

translation.en: Well...
-My daughter. -Thank you, daddy.
[Godswill] Ada-nna.
-Thank you. -Congratulations.
[Godswill] Yes.
May I?
[man] Congratulations.
[man] Hello.
Hello.
Alhaji. I hope you enjoy yourself.
translation.zh: 阿拉吉 希望你很愉快

translation.en: -I intend to enjoy myself. -Beautiful.
[Adaeze] Can I get something...
What is it? Okay.
I'm tired.
By the way,
I want to change the carpet in that office.
translation.zh: 我要把办公室的地毯换了

translation.en: That burgundy just does my head in.
-Blue-- -I think you have an admirer, Ma.
What?
Stop staring, Onyinye.
Hi, Adaeze.
Hamza, hi.
How are you?
Very well. Are you... Are you having a good time?
translation.zh: 很好 你… 你在这里开心吗？

translation.en: Oh yeah, yeah.
I'm Onyinye. Leaving. [laughing]
translation.zh: 我是昂因耶 我走了

translation.en: Okay.
[in Igbo] I thought he's into hip-hop?
Is this going to be good?
You don't know your son. You'll soon see what he'll do.
translation.zh: 你不了解你儿子 你很快就会看到的

translation.en: -[in English] My brother! -Oh, okay.
[Obiora] Good evening, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh: 晚上好 女士们 先生们

translation.en: First of all, I just want to say a big congratulations to my dad...
translation.zh: 首先 我恭喜我的父亲…

translation.en: on his retirement.
And I have a special song for you...
translation.zh: 我有一首特别的歌献给你

translation.en: It's titled Obiagu.
Wow.
[in Igbo] Open the gate.
You always underrate me!
-Isn't it the same work we do? -[horn honks rapidly]
translation.zh: 这不还是我们以前做的工作吗？

translation.en: Yet, you ask me to open the gate.
Are you talking to me in that manner?
translation.zh: 你用这种态度和我说话？

translation.en: It seems something is wrong with you.
